001package game;
002/**
003 * Command class - a command issued by the user.
004 *
005 * @author Christophe TARATIBU
006 * @version 2025/2026 (09.01.2026)
007 */
008public class Command
009{
010    /** Word used as command */
011    private final String aCommandWord;
012    /** Second word of the command */
013    private final String aSecondWord;
014    /**
015     * Create a command object. First and second word must be supplied, but
016     * either one (or both) can be null. The command word should be null to
017     * indicate that this was a command that is not recognised by this game.
018     * @param pCommandWord The first word of the command. Null if the command
019     *                     was not recognised.
020     * @param pSecondWord  The second word of the command.
021     */
022    public Command(final String pCommandWord,final String pSecondWord){
023        this.aCommandWord = pCommandWord;
024        this.aSecondWord = pSecondWord;
025
026    }
027
028    /**
029     * Returns the command word of this command.
030     * @return The command word (the first word) of this command. If the
031     *         command was not understood, the result is null.
032     */
033    public String getCommandWord(){
034        return this.aCommandWord;
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Returns the second word of this command.
039     * @return The second word of this command. Returns null if there was no
040     *         second word.
041     */
042    public String getSecondWord(){
043        return this.aSecondWord;
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * Verifies is command has a second word
048     * @return true if the command has a second word.
049     */
050    public boolean hasSecondWord(){
051       
052        return this.aSecondWord != null;
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * Verifies if the command word is unknown
057     * @return true if the command word is unknown
058     */
059    public boolean isUnknown(){
060        return this.aCommandWord == null;
061    }
062} // Command
